tools.name: LTspice
tools.description: Free SPICE simulator for analog circuits. Very popular among students and professionals.

tools.name: Cadence Virtuoso
tools.description: Professional tool for analog IC design. Used in most semiconductor companies.

tools.name: TINA-TI
tools.description: Texas Instruments SPICE simulator. Good for beginners.

tools.name: PSpice
tools.description: Classic SPICE simulator from Cadence. Still widely used.

tools.name: Multisim
tools.description: Circuit simulation software from National Instruments. Easy to use.

tools.name: Synopsys Design Compiler
tools.description: RTL synthesis tool. Industry standard for digital design.

tools.name: Cadence Innovus
tools.description: Place and route tool for digital chips.

tools.name: Yosys
tools.description: Open source synthesis tool. Good for learning VLSI.

tools.name: Vivado
tools.description: Xilinx FPGA design tool. Very popular for FPGA development.

tools.name: Quartus Prime
tools.description: Intel FPGA design software. Alternative to Vivado.

tools.name: Cadence AMS Designer
tools.description: Mixed-signal verification platform for complex designs.

tools.name: Mentor Questa ADMS
tools.description: Advanced mixed-signal simulator for verification.

tools.name: MATLAB Signal Processing Toolbox
tools.description: Complete signal processing toolkit. Very comprehensive.

tools.name: GNU Radio
tools.description: Free software for software-defined radio. Great for learning.

tools.name: SciPy Signal
tools.description: Python library for signal processing. Free and powerful.

tools.name: LabVIEW
tools.description: Graphical programming for signal processing and data acquisition.

tools.name: Keysight SystemVue
tools.description: System-level design for wireless communications. Professional tool.

tools.name: Wireless InSite
tools.description: Radio propagation software for network planning.

tools.name: SDR-Radio
tools.description: Software defined radio receiver. Free and easy to use.

tools.name: HFSS
tools.description: Electromagnetic simulation software for antennas and RF circuits.

tools.name: CST Studio Suite
tools.description: Electromagnetic simulation for wireless and RF applications.

tools.name: Keil MDK
tools.description: IDE for ARM microcontrollers. Industry standard but expensive.

tools.name: Arduino IDE
tools.description: Simple IDE for Arduino. Perfect for beginners.

tools.name: PlatformIO
tools.description: Modern IDE for embedded development. Works with many boards.

tools.name: STM32CubeIDE
tools.description: Free IDE for STM32 microcontrollers. Good documentation.

tools.name: MPLAB X IDE
tools.description: IDE for Microchip microcontrollers. Free to use.

tools.name: ESP-IDF
tools.description: Development framework for ESP32. Good for IoT projects.

tools.name: TensorFlow Lite for Microcontrollers
tools.description: Run ML models on microcontrollers. Good for IoT projects.

tools.name: Edge Impulse
tools.description: Easy platform for ML on edge devices. Great for beginners.

tools.name: MATLAB Deep Learning Toolbox
tools.description: Professional ML tools. Expensive but comprehensive.

tools.name: PyTorch Mobile
tools.description: Deploy PyTorch models on mobile and embedded devices.

tools.name: Altium Designer
tools.description: Professional PCB design software. Industry standard but expensive.

tools.name: KiCad
tools.description: Free and open source PCB design tool. Great for students.

tools.name: Eagle
tools.description: Easy to use PCB design software. Good for hobbyists.

tools.name: Cadence Allegro
tools.description: High-end PCB design for complex boards. Used in industry.

tools.name: EasyEDA
tools.description: Web-based PCB design tool. Free and simple to use.

tools.name: PSIM
tools.description: Power electronics simulation software. Good for power circuits.

tools.name: PLECS
tools.description: Power electronics simulation tool. Easy to use.

tools.name: MATLAB Simscape Power Systems
tools.description: Power system simulation in MATLAB. Very comprehensive.

tools.name: PowerWorld Simulator
tools.description: Power system analysis software. Good for grid studies.

tools.name: LabVIEW
tools.description: Graphical programming for test and measurement. Very popular.

tools.name: Python with PyVISA
tools.description: Control instruments using Python. Free and flexible.

tools.name: MATLAB Instrument Control Toolbox
tools.description: Control instruments from MATLAB. Good integration.

tools.name: Keysight Command Expert
tools.description: Easy instrument control software. Free from Keysight.
